frame.name: Communicate_categorization
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates a message stating an <fen>Item</fen>'s membership in a <fen>Category</fen>, i.e., asserts that the <fen>Item</fen> has the defining characteristics of the <fen>Category</fen>. Alternatively, the message is conceived as communicated by a <fen>Medium</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Speaker">He</fex> <t>depicted</t> <fex name="Item">his involvement</fex> <fex name="Category">as merely peripheral</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Medium">The first half of the book</fex> <t>portrays</t> <fex name="Item">Bragg's mother</fex> <fex name="Category">as a beautiful and heartbroken woman</fex></ex>.</def-root>

FE.name: Speaker
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual that communicates the message concerning the <fen>Category</fen> of an <fen>Item</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Category
FE.definition: <def-root>The class of entities with characteristics that match those of the <fen>Item</fen> according to the portrayal of the <fen>Speaker</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> portrays as belonging to a <fen>Category</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An action taken by the <fen>Speaker</fen> through which they communicate that the <fen>Item</fen> fits into a particular <fen>Category</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition:
<def-root>The piece of text in which a <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates their categorization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
<ex>However, <fex name="Medium">"A Brief History of Medicine"</fex> <t>characterizes</t> influenza as the most deadly plague, overall.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The point in time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes a characterization of the <fen>Item</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> characterizes the <fen>Item</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the categorization is made. </def-root>

FE.name: Criteria
FE.definition: <def-root>The characteristics of an <fen>Item</fen> that fit the defining characteristics of a <fen>Category</fen>, and thus serve as the basis of the <fen>Speaker</fen>s characterization of the <fen>Item</fen> .</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably, presumably, mysteriously</ment>), secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may also indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Speaker</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>Duration denotes the length of time from the beginning of a continuous situation (the one denoted by the target) to its end. In many cases, the continuous situation is a dynamic action which is ongoing, while in others it is simply an undifferentiated state.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: characterize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: describe the distinctive character of

lexUnit.name: depiction.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: depiction is a derivative of depict

lexUnit.name: describe.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give a detailed account in words of.

lexUnit.name: description.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a spoken or written account of a person, object, or event.

lexUnit.name: portray.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: describe in a particular way.

lexUnit.name: represent.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: portray in a particular way

lexUnit.name: representation.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an image, model, or other depiction of something.

lexUnit.name: define.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: state or describe exactly the nature, scope, or meaning of.

lexUnit.name: definition.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a formal statement of the exact nature, scope, or meaning of something.

lexUnit.name: redefinition.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: redefinition is a derivative of redefine

lexUnit.name: characterization.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: characterization is a derivative of characterize

lexUnit.name: treat.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: consider or regard in a certain way

lexUnit.name: make out to be.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to porttay something as being in a specified category
